Reviews.Title: LG 55LV355B
Reviews.Author: golmert
Reviews.Content: This is a commercial display. It was not that clearly mentioned,stunning picture. sound is not that good though. Over all very satisfied with this TV.

ProductInfo.Features:
1920 x 1080 (FHD) Resolution
2,000,000:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio
Built-In ATSC/NTSC/QAM Clear Filter
Additional Features : Digital Signage Function with Free Software ;Public Display Settings - Cloning Capable ;EcoSmart Energy Saving Levels ;RoHS Compliant ;Energy Star ;.3 Auto Sensing Remote Jack Pack (RJP) Compatible ;Pro:Centric ST
ProductInfo.Name: LG 55LV355B 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz LED HDTV, EzSign
